sentences.en: Any obituary added runs through the next six editions until the publishing cycle has been completed.
sentences.cn: 也就是说每则新增的讣文会在报纸上连续刊登七个版.

sentences.en: Are you saying you left that obituary to help me?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是你放下那个讣告是为了帮助我?

sentences.en: Elizabeth Taylor : That always sounds to me like an 2 obituary.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白·泰勒: 这听起来很像悼词.

sentences.en: Five days after the letter came, he found Andersen s obituary in the morning paper.
sentences.cn: 收到那封信五天后, 他在早报上发现了安德森的讣告.

sentences.en: His obituary was published in one edition of his own newspaper before it was discovered that he was alive.
sentences.cn: 他的讣文刊登在他自己的报纸版面上之后，才发现他还活着。

sentences.en: However, Mr Pinkston, at International Crisis Group , cautioned against writing Kim Jong - woon's political obituary prematurely.
sentences.cn: 不过, 国际危机分析组织的品克斯顿先生反对过早为 金正云 的政治生涯草草画上句号.

sentences.en: I read Sewell's obituary in the Daily News.
sentences.cn: 我在《每日新闻》上读到了休厄尔的讣告.

sentences.en: I should like to add a postscript to your obituary for John Cage.
sentences.cn: 我想在你为约翰·凯奇写的讣告后补充一点内容。

sentences.en: Introducing some works I've done last December. A light in the Darkness , HOT & My Obituary.
sentences.cn: 为大家介绍去年拍摄的一些作品,即将推出. 明月照灰霾, HOT,以及我的补告.

sentences.en: Just look in the obituary column of today's L . A . Post - Record.
sentences.cn: 看看今天洛杉矶邮政记录中的讣告栏.

sentences.en: Paris Carwer: I used to look in the papers every day for your obituary.
sentences.cn: 派利丝卡华: 我每天也在新闻找你的讣文.

sentences.en: Remember a resume is a marketing document, not a career obituary.
sentences.cn: 记住履历是一份推销自己的文档, 而不是你以前职业的讣告.

sentences.en: Taylor believes that network obituary will attract older users, a major development.
sentences.cn: 泰勒相信,网络讣告将吸引老年用户, 取得重大发展.

sentences.en: The obituary records the whole life of the deceased.
sentences.cn: 讣文记述了这位死者的生平.

sentences.en: The Scheme: When times get tough, write your obituary.
sentences.cn: 方案：当时间不允许时，撰写你的讣告。

sentences.en: When Grandfather died, Father sent the obituary to friends and family.
sentences.cn: 爷爷去世了, 爸爸向亲朋好友发了哀启.

sentences.en: Who says, The only bad publicity is your obituary?
sentences.cn: 谁说, 最不妙的广告是你的讣告?

trans.tran_en: an article in a newspaper about the life of someone who has just died
